alert.note: Alert for Rusk (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 27 at 5:30PM CDT until July 27 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Rusk County in northwestern Wisconsin... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 529 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles north of Ladysmith, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Hawkins around 550 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Tony, Rusk County Airport, Ingram and Glen Flora. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
